text: "Falling in Love (Is Hard on the Knees)" is a 1997 song by American hard rock band Aerosmith and taken from their 12th studio album Nine Lives. It topped the single charts in Spain and went to number 2 in Canada, number 22 in the United Kingdom and number 35 in the United States. ==Track listings== US CD and cassette single # "Falling in Love (Is Hard on the Knees)" – 3:25 # "Fall Together" – 4:38 UK and Australian CD single # "Falling in Love (Is Hard on the Knees)" – 3:25 # "Fall Together" – 4:38 # "Sweet Emotion" – 4:34 # "Season of Wither" – 5:39 == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Falling in Love (Is Hard on the Knees)
